ygData.subject: Re: money?
ygData.msgSnippet: Quest spoiler: Having said that, this is pretty common quest that people do.  Once you attain base standing with Stormguard (dwarven guards) from killing orcs,
ygData.messageBody:
Quest spoiler:














Having said that, this is pretty common quest that people do. Once you
attain base standing with Stormguard (dwarven guards) from killing orcs, etc
You can do this quest. A warrior dwarf in the way back of the warrior guild
in Kaladim will offer it, asking if you are Ready to serve, just say Yes I
am ready to serve and he'll tell you to get belts from orc cents in CB. He
gives little exp, faction, and 3 to 4 sp and an item ranging from a bandage
to a 2 gp gem. Very nice considering you'll probably run over there once
you have like 30 some odd belts saved up. Imagine this as a secondary drum
quest for later lvls.

Also the large tattered pad part of that quest seems to be broken for now,
so don't waste your pads on it yet.


Bryne
10th circle
Songweaver
Bertoxx


I've just arrived in Kaladim on my way to Kelethin and I'm looking to make
a little coin. What is this Belt Quest that you speak of? Would a Bard of
the Seventh Circle be able to complete it?Journeyman Plastos
